future-web3-open-source: Future Web3.0 is an open-source project.
user-experience-web3: It aims to enable users to experience Web3.0 and encourage further development based on this project.
using-standard-web-tech: It utilizes standard web technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JS.
not-affiliated-ms: This project is absolutely independent from Microsoft and should not be confused with any Microsoft operating system or product.
introduction-1: Future Web3.0 is an open-source project that simulates and innovates operating systems on the web using HTML, CSS, and JS. The specific release date for open-sourcing will be announced at a later time. If you have any feedback or suggestions regarding this project, please reach out to us on Twitter, and your inquiries will be addressed promptly. Anyone is welcome to continue developing on this foundation as our goal is to build a true Web3.0.
introduction-2: This project is an open-source initiative released under the EPL 2.0 license, which is a legally binding contract. Please comply with the open-source license and respect the efforts of others. As per the license, you are allowed to propagate, distribute, modify, and re-publish this project for personal and commercial purposes. However, you must provide the source code attribution, including the author and project link, and use the same license for distribution. If the source code of this project is released as part of another project alongside your proprietary source code, you may use a different license, but you must acknowledge the EPL portion and state that it continues to follow the EPL license. Referencing the source code without making modifications or additions to the project does not require open-sourcing.
introduction-3: We would like to express our gratitude to all the contributors of this project. In the future, we will open a contributors' community and distribute contribution points.
introduction-4: This project is absolutely independent from Microsoft and should not be confused with any Microsoft operating system or product.
welcome-usage: Welcome to use the "Camera" app! This application was developed by User782Tec and maintained by tjy-gitnub. During use, this application will get access to your camera (for taking photos and other operations). This app will not upload any of your personal information (including photos taken) to the server, nor will it be disclosed to others. If you do not agree with the above agreement, you will not be able to use this application.
pTag2: -Fixed a major disastrous incident where PWA intercepted theme retrieval requests
pTag4: -Fixed a disastrous incident where PWA intercepted dynamic requests
pTag5: -Adjusted the highly anticipated Start Menu scroll bar
pTag6: -Added the option to unpin Start Menu items with a right-click
summaryText: New logo and icons, UI optimization, customizable themes, and winver
pTag10: -New Icons: Redesigned and replaced icons with Win11 icons
pTag11: -Customizable Themes: Supports users to change and upload their own themes
pTag13: -New UI: Added Win11's hover and highlight effects
pTag14: -Startup Optimization: Increased speed, fixed issues with failure to start due to battery retrieval failure
pTag16: -Bug fixes: Fixed issue with right-click menu not closing
pTag17: -Code Optimization: Consolidated repetitive code, introduced application initialization load configuration
touch-device-adaptation: Touch Device Adaptation, 'Run' App, 'Whiteboard' App, Control Center, and detail fixes
